description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a referral screen in a mobile application. It manages user input for referral codes, interacts with a referral service, and displays messages based on success or failure of referral submissions.

classes.name: ReferralScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget representing the referral code entry screen.

classes.name: _ReferralScreenState
classes.description: State class managing UI and logic for ReferralScreen.

methods.name: _submitCode
methods.description: Handles submission of the referral code, updates state with success or error messages, and interacts with the ReferralsService.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes the TextEditingController when the widget is removed.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the referral screen including input field, messages, and buttons.
